SEARCH
Package server

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
server.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
This class handles some operations needed by the MarketServer. - Storage access and handling (credentials and forSaleProducts) - Credentials checking - products buy / sell / upload
Author:
EksPC

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    buyProduct(String id)
    This method allows a user to buy a product.
    boolean
    checkCredentials(CredentialsCouple cred)
    This method checks whether a user is in the database or not and returns true or false, respectively.
    List<Product>
    getProductsList(int code)
    This method returns the requested list of products.
    boolean
    returnProduct(String id)
    This method allows a user to return a product.
    void
    updateProductsFile()
    This method uploads the storage file at the end of every client session by fully re-writing the storage file.
    void
    updateProductsLists()
    This method updates the two available products list (products for sale and products owned by the client).
    boolean
    uploadProduct(String prod)
    This method upload a product by writing it on the products list, then the method updateProductsLists is used.

  • Method Details

    • checkCredentials

      public boolean checkCredentials(CredentialsCouple cred)
      This method checks whether a user is in the database or not and returns true or false, respectively.
      Parameters:
      cred - : CredentialsCouple object

    • getProductsList

      public List<Product> getProductsList(int code)
      This method returns the requested list of products. Code 1 = products for sell. Code 2 = owned products.
      Parameters:
      code - - int
      Returns:
      List

    • updateProductsLists

      public void updateProductsLists()
      This method updates the two available products list (products for sale and products owned by the client).

    • uploadProduct

      public boolean uploadProduct(String prod) throws IOException
      This method upload a product by writing it on the products list, then the method updateProductsLists is used.
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      IOException

    • updateProductsFile

      public void updateProductsFile() throws IOException
      This method uploads the storage file at the end of every client session by fully re-writing the storage file.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • buyProduct

      public boolean buyProduct(String id)
      This method allows a user to buy a product. Basically it re-writes the ownership of a product and updates the lists of product with the method updateProductsLists.

    • returnProduct

      public boolean returnProduct(String id)
      This method allows a user to return a product.
